phases.objective: Navigate directly to https://www.atob.com (potentially via a bookmark or recent history)

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely without errors

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly re-scan the homepage for any new information or direct calls to action
Navigate to Immediately locate and click the prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button, bypassing detailed browsing

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully redirected to the signup page (https://www.atob.com/get-started)

phases.objective: Navigate to Arrive at the 'Sign up form' on https://www.atob.com/get-started

assertions.description: Verify that verify the signup form is fully loaded and visible on the page

phases.objective: Navigate to Proceed to fill in or complete the signup form with full intent to submit
Click 'Submit Application' to finalize

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application form submits successfully and displays a confirmation or proceeds to the next step

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely without errors

phases.objective: Navigate to Scan the homepage for any direct links to 'Pricing' or 'Fees' sections
Navigate to If not found, click on a link leading to detailed product information, such as 'Learn More' or 'Fuel Card Details' to reach https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards)

phases.objective: Navigate to On the 'Fuel card details' page, specifically search for sections related to transaction fees, fuel discounts, monthly costs, or account setup fees

assertions.description: Verify that verify the presence of sections detailing transaction fees, fuel discounts, or other costs

phases.objective: Navigate to Carefully read and make note of any relevant cost-related details to compare externally
Navigate to https://www.atob.com

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads completely without errors

phases.objective: Navigate to Look for a navigation link or button explicitly stating 'Fuel Cards' or 'Our Product'
Click on the link to navigate to https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the correct product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards)

phases.objective: Scroll through the 'Fuel card details' page, reading about features, advantages, and potential savings

assertions.description: Verify that verify key sections like features, advantages, and savings are present and readable

phases.objective: Navigate to Review any FAQs or detailed specifications presented on the product page

assertions.description: Verify that verify the FAQ or detailed specifications section is present and accessible

phases.objective: Navigate to Consider if the product meets their trucking business needs

test_files.name: Mobile User Quick Scan & Action Test
test_files.title: Mobile User Quick Scan & Action

phases.objective: Navigate to Access https://www.atob.com on a mobile browser

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads successfully and is rendered for a mobile device

phases.objective: Navigate to Observe the mobile-optimized layout and prominent CTAs

assertions.description: Verify that verify the page displays a responsive, mobile-optimized layout
Verify that verify key Call-to-Actions (CTAs) are prominent and easily tappable on mobile

phases.objective: Navigate to Vertically scroll down the homepage to quickly scan main benefits and services

assertions.description: Verify that verify main benefits and services sections are visible and readable after scrolling

phases.objective: Tap on a 'Learn More' or 'Product Details' link to briefly view https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards

assertions.description: Verify that verify navigation to the product details page (https://www.atob.com/product-fuel-cards)

phases.objective: Navigate to Quickly scroll the product page to identify a key feature or benefit on mobile

assertions.description: Verify that verify key features or benefits are visible and scannable on the mobile product page

phases.objective: Tap the 'Apply Now' or 'Get Started' button (likely sticky or prominent on mobile) to navigate to https://www.atob.com/get-started

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully redirected to the signup page (https://www.atob.com/get-started)

phases.objective: Navigate to Begin filling out the signup form on their mobile device

assertions.description: Verify that verify the signup form is accessible and fields are usable on a mobile device

phases.objective: Navigate to https://www.atob.com and quickly scan the main value proposition

assertions.description: Verify that verify the homepage loads without errors
Verify that verify the main value proposition is prominently displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to Locate and click the prominent 'Get Started' or 'Apply Now' button on the homepage

assertions.description: Verify that verify user is successfully redirected to the signup page (https://www.atob.com/get-started)

phases.objective: Navigate to Arrive at the 'Sign up form' on https://www.atob.com/get-started

assertions.description: Verify that verify the signup form is fully loaded and visible on the page

phases.objective: Fill in required fields in the signup form
Click 'Submit Application' to proceed with the signup process

assertions.description: Verify that verify the application form submits successfully and displays a confirmation or proceeds to the next step
